attributes.action: Make it illegal for MPs to elevate to Prime Minister without holding a General election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that Gordon Brown has become Prime Minister in a non-democratic fashion, and that people did not vote Gordon Brown in as Prime Minister, but voted in Tony Blair.
People should not assume the role of Prime Minister unless they have been duly elected to that post. Anything short of this is a threat to democracy and people's right to a choice of a leader.
